summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Bennett Street, from 37th Avenue South to Empire Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7111 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
